name: Aristo
description:
Hi, welcome to Aristo! This version of the project (v.1.2) is an updated version (just bug fixes) of a project that was made from scratch in just a week. More features and updates are planned for this project.

How to Play:

  • Kill the King to win (the green heart represents the king's health)
  • Right-click on a unit to see it's current stats
  • Click on a unit to select it and move it to an available tile/attack/heal
  • The plus button on the top left corner can be use to buy new units/fortresses
  • Fortresses provide 10 gold/turn except for the first two turns
